original_text: His eyes burn like bright flames of fire. Many crowns are on his head. He has a name that is written on him, but nobody knows that name except himself. His eyes burn like bright flames of fire. Many crowns are on his head. He has a name that is written on him, but nobody knows that name except himself.
korean_text: 그 눈은 불꽃 같고 그 머리에는 많은 관들이 있고 또 이름 쓴 것 하나가 있으니 자기밖에 아는 자가 없고

sentences.original_text: His eyes burn like bright flames of fire
Many crowns are on his head
He has a name that is written on him
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게는 그 위에 기록된 이름이 있습니다

sentences.original_text: but nobody knows that name except himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 자신 외에는 그 이름을 아는 사람이 없습니다
